import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from 'react' // import { SocialIcon } from 'react-social-icons' const NavBar = () => { const [navBar, setNavBar] = useState(false) const [toggleMenu, setToggleMenu] = useState(false) const changeNavBarBackground = () => { if(window.scrollY >= 20) { setNavBar(true) } else { setNavBar(false) } } const handleMenuClick = () => { if(window.scrollX <= 947) { setToggleMenu(true) } else { setToggleMenu(false) } } window.addEventListener('resize', handleMenuClick) window.addEventListener('scroll', changeNavBarBackground) return (

) } export default NavBar
